actions.description: The hezrou makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

damage_resistances: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from Nonmagical Attacks
name: Hezrou

traits.description: The hezrou has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.name: Magic Resistance

traits.description: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the hezrou must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the hezrou's stench for 24 hours.
traits.name: Stench
